Title: RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT COUNCIL MEMBER JENNIFER GUTIERREZ AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY COMMISSION ON PUBLIC INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Action: P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.Description: This Resolution was P-C Item Laid Over by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Chapter 47 of the New York City Charter, the Council approves the appointment of Council Member Jennifer Gutierrez as a member of the New York City Commission on Public Information and Communication to serve an undefined term.
